thread.title: Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop
thread.title_full: Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop

title: Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop
text:
Mattel Swings to a Loss as Barbie Sales Drop Sixth straight quarter of declines for toy maker’s iconic doll By Updated July 16, 2015 7:18 p.m. ET 
Barbie’s makeover still needs a lot of work. 
Mattel Inc.’s sales of the doll fell 19% in the second quarter, as the toy maker swung to a quarterly loss and posted a 7% drop in overall net sales. The stronger U.S. dollar drove a large chunk of the decline, but Barbie’s sales would still have fallen 11% when stripping out currency... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In Popular on WSJ
